trends: There have been no other sightings in West Yorkshire
This sighting has been favorited 2 times.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy older brother and I were sat on a stone wall at the side of the road [Oldfield Lane in Oldfield. near Kieghley] waiting for our Father to come home from work Probably around 4pm as he had a motor bike and would give us a ride down the long drive to the farm house where we lived. I was 4 years old. it was summer I think because it was warm and I remember only wearing a T shirt and Shorts. Suddenly above the tree we were sitting under we noticed a Craft Hovering above us like it was watching us. It can't have been more than 20 ft above us, less I think. We both looked at it and said that must be "ThunderBird 2 " I can only remember seeing the front of the craft it was the same shape as ThunderBird 2 at the front. The back half was hidden by the tree. I noticed it was a Gun Metal grey color, with a dull shine and small windows in odd and random places. I can't remember seeing anyone inside, or if it made a sound. Then my father must have come along and I don't remember anything after that. When I ask my Brother now if he remembers, he says no but he is very afraid of UFOs.
Summary: Craft we thought was Thunder Bird 2 but a Gun Metal Grey with small Square windows in odd places.
